description: Explore the world of NFT token standards and their impact on digital ownership. Understand key standards like ERC-721, ERC-1155, and ERC-998, and learn how they shape the NFT ecosystem, offering opportunities in art, gaming, and beyond.
keywords: NFT, token standards, digital ownership, ERC-721, ERC-1155, ERC-998, blockchain, cryptocurrency, digital assets, smart contracts, dApps
title: Understanding NFT Token Standards: A Deep Dive into the World of Digital Ownership
